cities.name: Bhubaneswar
cities.culturalInfo: Known as the Temple City of India, Bhubaneswar features magnificent Kalinga architecture, ancient temples, and rich cultural heritage.
cities.festivals: Ratha Yatra, Durga Puja, Makar Sankranti
cities.history: Ancient capital of Kalinga empire, known for the famous Kalinga War that transformed Emperor Ashoka.

cities.name: Jaipur
cities.culturalInfo: The Pink City, famous for its palaces, forts, and vibrant markets showcasing Rajasthani culture and handicrafts.
cities.cuisine: Dal Baati Churma, Gatte ki Sabzi, Laal Maas
cities.history: Founded in 1727 by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II, planned according to Vastu Shastra.

cities.name: Mumbai
cities.culturalInfo: India's financial capital, blending traditional Marathi culture with modern cosmopolitan lifestyle and Bollywood glamour.
cities.cuisine: Vada Pav, Pav Bhaji, Bombay Duck, Misal Pav
cities.history: Group of seven islands transformed into a major port city under British colonial rule.
